review: Chromecast worked fine for streaming Netflix and that sort of thing, but its abilities to stream local media are basically non-existent. I set it up to stream content from a local Plex server, and it could barely do this; it would glitch and freeze every few minutes. This was not the fault of the Plex server, because it could stream fine to my iPhone with no log or freezes. Chromecast is okay for corproate streaming content but steer clear if you want to watch your own things. What a bummer. I regret my purchase completely.
